| History                 = Wu Pong Exports was a company that was owned by one of the world's richest individuals, [[Wu Pong (Earth-616)|Wu Pong]]. Every day in his private office, millions of American and Chinese dollars were exchanged. Unknown to his employees and the public at large, he was actually a millennia old alien dragon, a [[Makluans|Makluan]] who was in human form. After thousands of years of hiding among humans, he received a telepathic message from his captain, that it was time for the former crew to return to the site where their [[Makluan Starship|spaceship]] crashed. In front of his personal assistant he transformed into his true form, and then flew out of the office through the window.{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 271}}{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 273}}
